Maintenance¶

shutdown¶

Force-stops the bot.

`{prefix}shutdown` - stop the bot

restart¶

Restarts the bot.

`{prefix}restart` - restart the bot

update¶

Pulls code from GitHub and restarts. This pulls from whatever repository origin is linked to. If there are changes to download, and the download is successful, the bot restarts to apply changes.

`{prefix}update` - update to the latest commit and restart
